list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: enhance SEO metadata, add web manifest, and update theme color
- Update site metadata with detailed title, description, keywords, and Open Graph config for improved SEO and social sharing - Add site.webmanifest for PWA support and favicon integration - Set custom theme color in viewport export

task.summary: feat: add home page navigation bar
feat: add hero images, decorator blobs, dialog component, and framer-motion dependency

feat: add FAQ section with animated accordion, smooth scrolling, and supporting styles
- Add FAQ component with animated accordion using Radix UI and framer-motion - Create FAQ data and icon mapping in lib - Implement smooth scrolling with Lenis and integrate in layout - Update global styles for accordion animations and scroll padding - Enhance Home page to include FAQ section - Update dependencies: add @radix-ui/react-accordion and lenis - Refine copilot instructions and enforce return types

feat: add Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy pages with animated accordion UI
- Implement /terms and /privacy pages with detailed content and effective date - Use animated accordion for sectioned policy display with framer-motion - Add navigation links for Terms and Privacy to mobile navbar - Integrate back button and consistent styling with existing components

feat: add responsive footer with company info, quick links, policies, and social media
- Implement Footer component with brand description, navigation links, legal policies, and contact info - Add social media icons and external links for LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram - Integrate Footer into main layout for consistent site-wide display - Add @iconify/react dependency for icon support

feat: enhance SEO metadata, add web manifest, and update theme color
- Update site metadata with detailed title, description, keywords, and Open Graph config for improved SEO and social sharing - Add site.webmanifest for PWA support and favicon integration - Set custom theme color in viewport export
